recipe.title: Cauliflower with Horseradish Sauce
ingredients: 1 (2 1/2- to 3-lb) head of cauliflower, cut lengthwise into 8 wedges
instructions: Bring 1 inch of water to a boil in a 5-quart wide heavy pot. Steam cauliflower in a steamer rack set over boiling water in pot, covered, until just tender, about 12 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk together remaining ingredients in a bowl. Serve cauliflower topped with sauce.
